text: int sum ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return a ; else return b ; } int main ( ) { int n , r , p [ 99 ] [ 99 ] , i , j , k , s ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & r ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < r ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & p [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } for ( i = r - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { p [ i ] [ j ] += sum ( p [ i + 1 ] [ j ] , p [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ) ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , p [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
